name: Hamburger Maker
description:
🔪 Step foot into the dream of a hamburger chef! 

🍔  In Hamburger Maker you are making delicious burger for customers.

⚠️  But be careful! Many celebrities live in your town and they may come visit your shop!  

👨‍🍳  Get ready to cook up a storm with our fun and casual hamburger cooking game!

🎮 With responsive gameplay, you'll feel like a real chef as you create delicious, mouth-watering hamburgers. 

🍞🧆🥬🍅🧅🧀
Choose from a variety of food items to customize your burger, including juicy beef patties, crisp lettuce, ripe tomatoes, and tangy sauces. Cook your hamburger to perfection and serve it to hungry customers.

👆 Controls are simple; just tap but at the right time.

☄️ So why wait? Download Hamburger Maker today and become a master chef in the kitchen!
